thread.title: Thug Attacks San Francisco Christmas Tree
thread.title_full: Pro-Hamas Thug Attacks San Francisco Christmas Tree - Todd Starnes

author: @toddstarnes
title: Thug Attacks San Francisco Christmas Tree
text: A pro-Hamas mobster attacked the Christmas tree in San Francisco’s Union Square. The man, dressed in black, scaled the tree and posted anti-Christmas messages. The man also threw Christmas ornaments onto the ground. The demonstration reportedly attracted around 100 participants, some of whom carried signs that said “No Xmas as usual in a genocide” and “DA Jenkins drop all charges on the Bay Bridge 78.” The Christmas tree suffered significant damage. And as of Saturday night remained unlit. Watch videos of the protests below. TIRED OF BIG TECH CENSORSHIP? [Click here to get Todd’s exclusive newsletter filled with important conservative news and information.](https://us4.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=e0507c4c1980fd9357fa63803&id=92d26c77ee) Pro-Palestine protestor climbs on Christmas tree in Union Square, San Francisco— Raw Reporting (@Raw_Reporting) [pic.twitter.com/irUAdDgXep] [December 24, 2023] Pro-Palestinian protesters climb, toss ornaments off Union Square tree. It remains dark, potentially broken as— Betty Yu (@bett_yu) [@SFPD]investigates [@KPIXtv] [pic.twitter.com/NEGsjDK67m] [December 24, 2023] Remnants of today’s protest in Union Square. No lit tree in the eve of Christmas Eve. Still, lots of people taking pictures around the the tree.— Christine Ni 倪君怡 (@christineniSF) [@nbcbayarea] [pic.twitter.com/MQPNdrsSCb] [December 24, 2023]
